Title: Relates to establishing legally sufficient evidence in certain crimes against a vulnerable elderly, physically disabled, incompetent or incapacitated person
Summary: Establishes a reasonable inference that certain transfers of money or property by a vulnerable elderly, physically disabled, incompetent or incapacitated person were a wrongful taking in violation larceny statutes.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to evidence in certain crimes against a vulnerable elderly, physically disabled, incompetent or incapacitated person
